perturbation.original_text: "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008."
perturbation.changed_text: "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until a date mutually agreed upon in good faith."
perturbation.explanation: Replacing the fixed expiration date 'March 31, 2008' with 'a date mutually agreed upon in good faith' introduces ambiguity. This makes the term of the agreement uncertain and dependent on future negotiations, potentially conflicting with principles of contract law that require definite terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring definiteness of terms

perturbation.original_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as potentially amended or possibly modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in other conceivable respects might be ratified and could continue in effect.
perturbation.explanation: This sentence attempts to keep the original agreement valid, however, 'herein expressly amended' is changed to 'potentially amended', 'necessary implication modified' is changed to 'possibly modified', 'all other respects is hereby ratified' is changed to 'other conceivable respects might be ratified', and 'shall continue in full force and effect' is changed to 'could continue in effect'. This change makes it ambiguous as to which aspects of the original agreement remain valid, contradicting the contractual law which needs definite obligations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clarity of obligations.

perturbation.original_text: By signing in the places indicated below, the parties hereto accept and agree to all of the terms and conditions hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: By signing in the places indicated below, the parties hereto may accept and generally agree to the spirit of the terms and conditions hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The statement 'accept and agree to all of the terms and conditions hereof' has been modified to 'may accept and generally agree to the spirit of the terms and conditions hereof.' Replacing 'accept and agree' with 'may accept and generally agree to the spirit' introduces ambiguity regarding the parties' actual commitment to the contract's specific terms. This weakens the binding nature of the agreement and creates confusion about the enforceability of individual clauses.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring a clear and unequivocal agreement.
